nodes.text: The Red Light Sector Concourse was a marketplace and public plaza in the Red Light Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Concourse was one of the only sections of the Red Light Sector that was not overrun by the Bleeder gangs, and Hutt security forces patrolled the area to ensure that it remained as such.
The Red Light Sector Concourse appears as part of the Red Light Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
